New Records: India won by 302 runs, which is one of the largest victory margins in ODI history.
Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami took 5 wickets for 18 runs, earning him the Player of the Match award.
Shubman Gill scored 92 runs off 92 balls.
Virat Kohli scored 88 runs off 94 balls.
Shreyas Iyer scored 82 runs off 56 balls.
Sri Lanka was bowled out for 55 runs in 19.4 overs.
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to field first.
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammed Shami expressed satisfaction with his performance and the team's dominant win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai.
The game was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023.
